name: Get Portal Experience
description: Load the editable experience manifest for a portal, merging current-space overrides with global defaults.

portal_id.description: Portal identifier (e.g. concierge, customer). Defaults to concierge.

space_id.description: Space slug to load the portal from. Defaults to the caller's current space.

include_metadata.description: When true, include the full merged portal record in the response.
